readable.title: 2860372882_e0ef4131d4
readable.content: A man in bright orange shorts is skateboarding along a course with cones as two people observe in the background . A man in orange shorts and knee pads is in a blurry picture . A man in orange shorts , knee pads and a helmet , moves quickly on a street course . a man in orange shorts moving really fast A skater goes through a course .
